description: Source code for the frontend of a Flutter-based Tic Tac Toe game, including UI layout, theme configuration, game logic, and interaction handling.

classes.name: TicTacToeApp
classes.description: Main application widget setting up the theme and home page for the Tic Tac Toe game.

classes.name: TicTacToePage
classes.description: Stateful widget representing the main game page.

methods.name: main
methods.description: Entry point, initializes and runs the app.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the UI for the app or specific widget.

methods.name: _resetGame
methods.description: Resets the game state to start a new game.

methods.name: _handleCellTap
methods.description: Handles user tapping on a game cell, updates game state accordingly.

methods.name: _checkGameStatus
methods.description: Checks the current board to determine if there's a winner or a draw.

methods.name: _buildPlayerStatus
methods.description: Builds the widget showing current player or game over status.

methods.name: _buildEndGameStatus
methods.description: Builds the widget indicating the game result (win or draw).

methods.name: _buildGridCell
methods.description: Builds individual cells of the game grid, handling display and tap detection.
